title: ruby.sh: line 19: bad substitution: no closing `)' in <(

labels.name: outdated
labels.description: PR was locked due to age

body:
# Please note we will close your issue without comment if you delete, do not read or do not fill out the issue checklist below and provide ALL the requested information. If you repeatedly fail to use the issue template, we will block you from ever submitting issues to Homebrew again. - [x] your problem was from running the official `install` or `uninstall` script? - [x] after installation: ran `brew config` and `brew doctor` and included their output with your issue? If you couldn't install: provided your OS version with the output of your issue? ## What you were trying to do (and why) Install Homebrew ## What happened (include command output) Saw a warning/error: ``` ~/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/utils/ruby.sh: line 19: bad substitution: no closing `)' in <( ``` Expand below for details.
Command output 
…
==> Tapping homebrew/core
remote: Enumerating objects: 1097704, done.
remote: Counting objects: 100% (75/75), done.
remote: Compressing objects: 100% (35/35), done.
remote: Total 1097704 (delta 40), reused 75 (delta 40), pack-reused 1097629
Receiving objects: 100% (1097704/1097704), 418.71 MiB | 30.24 MiB/s, done.
Resolving deltas: 100% (756062/756062), done.
From https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core
 * [new branch]              master     -> origin/master
Updating files: 100% (6223/6223), done.
HEAD is now at ccd98dd9e75 repo: update 2.18 bottle.
/mnt/home/shaun.jackman/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/utils/ruby.sh: line 19: bad substitution: no closing `)' in <(
      # function which() is set by brew.sh
      # it's aliased to `type -P`
      # shellcheck disable=SC2230
      which -a ruby
      # shellcheck disable=SC2230
      PATH="${HOMEBREW_PATH}" which -a ruby
    )
==> Downloading https://ghcr.io/v2/homebrew/portable-ruby/portable-ruby/blobs/sha256:cd7fffb18ef9338baa670fc5e8fce99b0e3cc0f0fd7627bcbb56f3c8d54161d4
Already downloaded: /mnt/home/shaun.jackman/.cache/Homebrew/portable-ruby-2.6.8.x86_64_linux.bottle.tar.gz
==> Pouring portable-ruby-2.6.8.x86_64_linux.bottle.tar.gz
==> Installation successful!
…
## What you expected to happen No warning/error ``` ~/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/utils/ruby.sh: line 19: bad substitution: no closing `)' in <( # function which() is set by brew.sh # it's aliased to `type -P` # shellcheck disable=SC2230 which -a ruby # shellcheck disable=SC2230 PATH="${HOMEBREW_PATH}" which -a ruby ) ``` ## Step-by-step reproduction instructions (by running `brew` commands) ```console $ /bin/bash --version | head -n1 GNU bash, version 4.2.46(2)-release (x86_64-koji-linux-gnu) $ /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" ``` ## `brew config` ``` HOMEBREW_VERSION: 3.3.5-25-g7c4247e ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/brew HEAD: 7c4247eec9685071cbadc52952d0f2afadf022cc Last commit: 7 hours ago Core tap ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core Core tap HEAD: ccd98dd9e75bd87e58b919cbe1d35628ce1398b8 Core tap last commit: 44 minutes ago Core tap branch: master HOMEBREW_PREFIX: /mnt/home/shaun.jackman/.linuxbrew HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY: /mnt/home/shaun.jackman/.linuxbrew/Homebrew HOMEBREW_CELLAR: /mnt/home/shaun.jackman/.linuxbrew/Cellar HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS: [] HOMEBREW_CORE_GIT_REMOTE: https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core HOMEBREW_DEVELOPER: set HOMEBREW_EDITOR: vim HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS: 96 HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE: set HOMEBREW_NO_INSTALL_CLEANUP: set Homebrew Ruby: 2.6.8 => /mnt/home/shaun.jackman/.linuxbrew/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/portable-ruby/2.6.8/bin/ruby CPU: 96-core 64-bit skylake Clang: N/A Git: 2.26.1 => /bin/git Curl: 7.76.1 => /bin/curl Kernel: Linux 5.4.74-36.135.amzn2.x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux OS: Amazon Linux release 2 (Karoo) (Karoo) Host glibc: 2.26 /usr/bin/gcc: 7.3.1 /usr/bin/ruby: 2.0.0 glibc: N/A gcc@5: N/A xorg: N/A ``` ## `brew doctor` ``` Warning: Your Homebrew's prefix is not /home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew. Some of Homebrew's bottles (binary packages) can only be used with the default prefix (/home/linuxbrew/.linuxbrew). You will encounter build failures with some formulae. Please create pull requests instead of asking for help on Homebrew's GitHub, Twitter or any other official channels. You are responsible for resolving any issues you experience while you are running this unsupported configuration. ```
